Description: Fragment of neck and rising round handle to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Red paint. Traces of lost circular label. Clay near fine grey-purple. Circular stamp with Helios head symbol.
Curator's comments: Name Aristomachos. From the same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, ABC 0075.10.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (74)
